specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” get +3” range when shooting and +3” range when using charge actions.

specialRules.hint: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Model gets AP(+1).

specialRules.description: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Model gets AP(+1).

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair

specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

spells.name: Dark Sight
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Havoc Terror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Cursed Sludge
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” moves -6” next time it charges.

spells.name: Havoc Trauma
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Warp Passage
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Daemon Fog
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
